languages.text: "Я... ему верю. Леди Теодора всегда играла по-крупному — все или ничего. Она не могла иначе". {n}Идира кривится, хватаясь за виски и огрызается куда-то в сторону:{/n} "Да усуньтесь вы уже, не знаю я никакого Дария!"

"I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"
languages.original_text: "Я... ему верю. Леди Теодора всегда играла по-крупному — все или ничего. Она не могла иначе". {n}Идира кривится, хватаясь за виски и огрызается куда-то в сторону:{/n} "Да усуньтесь вы уже, не знаю я никакого Дария!"

"I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

languages.text: «Le... le creo. Lady Theodora siempre apostaba fuerte: todo o nada. Era el único juego que aceptaba». {n}Idira hace una mueca, se lleva las manos a las sienes, y grita mientras se gira:{/n} «¿Os queréis callar de una vez? No conozco a ningún Darius, ¿entendido?».
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

traits.locale_text: «Le... le creo. Lady Theodora siempre apostaba fuerte: todo o nada. Era el único juego que aceptaba». {n}Idira hace una mueca, se lleva las manos a las sienes, y grita mientras se gira:{/n} «¿Os queréis callar de una vez? No conozco a ningún Darius, ¿entendido?».

languages.text: “我……我相信他的话。西奥多拉夫人总是喜欢孤注一掷，要么一飞冲天，要么倾家荡产。这是她最喜欢的游戏。”{n}伊迪拉的脸扭曲着，紧紧捂着自己的太阳穴，随后转过头，大声咒骂起来。{/n}“能不能闭上你们的臭嘴？我根本不认识什么达利乌斯，明白吗？”
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

traits.locale_text: “我……我相信他的话。西奥多拉夫人总是喜欢孤注一掷，要么一飞冲天，要么倾家荡产。这是她最喜欢的游戏。”{n}伊迪拉的脸扭曲着，紧紧捂着自己的太阳穴，随后转过头，大声咒骂起来。{/n}“能不能闭上你们的臭嘴？我根本不认识什么达利乌斯，明白吗？”

languages.text: 「あ…あたいは彼を信じる。レディ・シオドーラは常にいちかばちかの賭けをしている。これまでは彼女にとってただのゲームに過ぎなかった」{n}イディラは顔をしかめて、こめかみを抑え、拒否するようにきつく言う。{/n}「もう黙ってくれる？ダリウスなんて知らない、分かった？」
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

traits.locale_text: 「あ…あたいは彼を信じる。レディ・シオドーラは常にいちかばちかの賭けをしている。これまでは彼女にとってただのゲームに過ぎなかった」{n}イディラは顔をしかめて、こめかみを抑え、拒否するようにきつく言う。{/n}「もう黙ってくれる？ダリウスなんて知らない、分かった？」

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich glaube ihm. Lady Theodora hat immer hoch gepokert ... alles oder nichts. Etwas anderes kam für sie nie infrage. {n}Idira verzieht das Gesicht zu einer Grimasse, reibt sich die Schläfen und wendet sich schließlich ab:{/n} "Haltet Ihr jetzt endlich den Mund? Ich kenne keinen Darius, verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Ich glaube ihm. Lady Theodora hat immer hoch gepokert ... alles oder nichts. Etwas anderes kam für sie nie infrage. {n}Idira verzieht das Gesicht zu einer Grimasse, reibt sich die Schläfen und wendet sich schließlich ab:{/n} "Haltet Ihr jetzt endlich den Mund? Ich kenne keinen Darius, verstanden?"

languages.text: « Je... je veux bien le croire. Dame Théodora n'aimait rien tant que les grands enjeux... Avec elle, c'était tout ou rien. C'est la seule façon de jouer qu'elle ait jamais reconnue. » {n}Idira esquisse une grimace, porte les mains à ses tempes et se détourne en aboyant :{/n} « Bouclez-la, à la fin ! Je le dis et je répète, je ne connais pas de Darius ! »
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... je veux bien le croire. Dame Théodora n'aimait rien tant que les grands enjeux... Avec elle, c'était tout ou rien. C'est la seule façon de jouer qu'elle ait jamais reconnue. » {n}Idira esquisse une grimace, porte les mains à ses tempes et se détourne en aboyant :{/n} « Bouclez-la, à la fin ! Je le dis et je répète, je ne connais pas de Darius ! »

languages.text: "Ben... Buna inanırım. Leydi Theodora daima büyük oynardı. Ya hep ya hiç riskini severdi. Başka fırsatları gözü görmezdi." {n}İdira; yüzünü buruşturuyor, şakaklarını ovuşturuyor ve arkasını dönüp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Susacak mısınız artık? Darius falan tanımıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I... I believe him. Lady Theodora always played for high stakes — all or nothing. It's the only game there ever was for her." {n}Idira grimaces, clutches her temples, and snaps as she turns away:{/n} "Will you shut your gobs already? I don't know any Dariuses, got it?"
